channel.title: Port Forwarding
channel.description:
Hi
I need help Port Forwarding with a SKY Sagem Router that I use wirelessly on a laptop. I dont know what to put in these Inbound/Outbound Boxes for my Firewall Settings. It comes up with something like this:
[b]FIREWALL RULES - OUTBOUND SERVICES
Filter Name: Service: Action - Block ALWAYS Block By Schedule Allow ALWAYS Allow By Schedule LAN Users - Any Single Address Address Range Start: 4 boxes Netmask: 4 boxes WAN Users - Any Single Address Address Range Start: 4 boxes Netmask: 4 boxes
FIREWALL RULES - INBOUND SERVICES
Filter Name: Service: Action - Allow ALWAYS Allow By Schedule Block ALWAYS Block By Schedule Send to LAN server: 4 boxes WAN Users - Any Single Address Address Range Start: 4 boxes Netmask: 4 boxes[/b]
I am willing to give Co Owner on my server if it works My Email (if needed) is ix_jaz_xi@hotmail.co.uk

item.title: Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

Then idk whats wrong.

Read full topic

Yes yes I know all that. Ive already done all the No-ip DUC stuff

item.title: Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

Do you know your default gateway? If you don’t click your start menu, click “run”, type in “cmd”, type in “ipconfig”, and press enter and it should give you all the information you need.

Read full topic

item.title: Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @iX_Jaz_Xi iX_Jaz_Xi
item.description:
@iX_Jaz_Xi wrote:

Hi

I need help Port Forwarding with a SKY Sagem Router that I use wirelessly on a laptop.
I dont know what to put in these Inbound/Outbound Boxes for my Firewall Settings.
It comes up with something like this:

[b]FIREWALL RULES - OUTBOUND SERVICES

Filter Name:
Service:
Action - Block ALWAYS
Block By Schedule
Allow ALWAYS
Allow By Schedule
LAN Users - Any
Single Address
Address Range
Start: 4 boxes
Netmask: 4 boxes
WAN Users - Any
Single Address
Address Range
Start: 4 boxes
Netmask: 4 boxes

FIREWALL RULES - INBOUND SERVICES

Filter Name:
Service:
Action - Allow ALWAYS
Allow By Schedule
Block ALWAYS
Block By Schedule
Send to LAN server: 4 boxes
WAN Users - Any
Single Address
Address Range
Start: 4 boxes
Netmask: 4 boxes[/b]

I am willing to give Co Owner on my server if it works
My Email (if needed) is ix_jaz_xi@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic
